name: Firebase Rules Syntax Highlighter
description:
Provides support for the Firebase rules language.


Firebase Rules Syntax Highlighter



Features:
  • Syntax highlighting
  • Syntax checking
  • Basic code completion
  • Code formatting
  • Code navigation

Actions:
  • Right click -> New -> Firestore rule file
  • Right click -> New -> Storage rule file
notes:
Versions:
  • All Intellij products support: 2022.2.1

Plugin updates:
  • 2022.2.1 (2022-05-23) - Update to new intellij version
  • 2022.1.4 (2022-05-12) - Fix find usages inspection
    • Fix issue with find usages inspection.
    • Added duplicate service inspection.
  • 2022.1.3 (2022-05-05) - Added features
    • Added find usages inspection.
    • Added go to definition navigation CTRL + click.
    • Added color for built-in types.
    • Highlight unused functions, parameters, variables or paths.
    • fixed issue: #87
  • 2.7.1 (2022-03-16) - Fixed issue with EAP IDE versions
    • Updated org.jetbrains.intellij version.
  • 2.7.0 (2021-12-20) - Fixed issue with keywords and Interpolations
    • Fixed issue with path variables interpolations.
  • 2.6.7 (2021-12-01) - Added support for intellij new version
    • Added support for new intellij version.
  • 2.6.6 (2021-09-24) - Added local inspections
    • Added local inspection for duplicated functions.
    • Added local inspection for weak security rules.
    • Added local inspection for duplicated path variables.
    • Added color support for service name.
    • Added quote handler.

    • Fixed issue with external library.
